Release 0.1.3 - 2017-03-11

Type Changes By
New cloud based build support. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.1.2 - 2017-03-11

Type Changes By
Upgraded fax4j version. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.1.1 - 2015-08-28

Type Changes By
Documentation changes. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.1.0 - 2015-04-24

Type Changes By
Fixed maven site links. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.9 - 2015-04-24

Type Changes By
Updated docs to remove reference of sourceforge as project is now hosted in github. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.8 - 2013-12-13

Type Changes By
Upgraded fax4j version. Sagie Gur-Ari
Added CLIRR report as part of the maven build. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.7 - 2013-12-02

Type Changes By
Added support for multi part HTTP requests. Sagie Gur-Ari
Added support for JSON HTTP responses (The web2fax servlet will now return JSON object by default). Sagie Gur-Ari
Upgraded fax4j version. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.6 - 2013-09-12

Type Changes By
Modified code to return generic fax bridges instead of specific types to allow easier extending of existing x2fax implementations. Sagie Gur-Ari
If -help parameter is provided to any of the start scripts, the instructions text file will be printed. Sagie Gur-Ari
Initial work on JUnit test cases. Sagie Gur-Ari
Upgraded fax4j version. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.5 - 2013-09-06

Type Changes By
Documentation changes. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.4 - 2013-09-01

Type Changes By
Fixed startup scripts. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.3 - 2013-09-01

Type Changes By
Updated fax4j version. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.2 - 2013-09-01

Type Changes By
Minor documentation fixes. Sagie Gur-Ari

Release 0.0.1 - 2013-08-31

Type Changes By
Initial Release. Sagie Gur-Ari
